description: I'm easy going yet also have a bit of a serious side as well, love people with a sense of humour and a zest for life, generally down to earth folk. I have an intense dislike for BS. I enjoy life as best I can and try my best to dodge the curve balls. I'm new to the online dating thing and have heard more negative than positive points but as they say ... don't have high expectations and you will never be disappointed, will see if anything comes of this.
